scrape.title: The dinner
scrape.author: Kate
scrape.text: WEIRD WEIRD WEIRD. I finished this book feeling completely unsettled and unsure of what to think. Though I'm not 100% in love with it, I feel like it has an interesting premise and set-up, and was well written. I would like to read some of Koch's other work to see if it's all as strange as The Dinner, or if this was just a fluke...
